name: get_vps_locations_array
description:
Use this function to get a list of the Locations available for ordering. The id
* field in the return value is also needed to pass to the buy_vps functions.

function.name: get_vps_locations_array
function.desc: Use this function to get a list of the Locations available for ordering. The id field in the return value is also needed to pass to the buy_vps functions.
